reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Valutazione Globale sulla stato della natura e azioni di salvaguardia della biodiversità nel Pakistan settentrionale

description.narrative: Il progetto mira a contribuire alla conservazione della biodiversità e ad impedire il degrado dell'ambiente nei confronti dell'ecosistema fragile antropizzato e selvaggio
The project aims ti contibute to the preservation of biodiversity and to prevent the degradation of enviroment on anthropized and wild fragile ecosystem

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
IUCN - International Union for the Conservation of Nature

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources
Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
